Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted with the finest materials and unparalleled craftsmanship, ensuring it stands as a testament to quality and excellence. Given its unique features and the effort put into its creation, we believe it is valued at $800000. We are confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations, providing unparalleled benefits and satisfaction. Please consider this offer and let us know if you have any questions or need further information. We look forward to the opportunity to share this remarkable product with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $800,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $800,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
